title: Terceira Lombada (Pico da)
body:
A mountainous elevation in the parish of Ponta Delgada, offering beautiful horizons.

Ter√ßos. A populated site in the parish of Ponta Delgada. In this site is the Quinta da Palmeira, which is now the episcopal residence, and a chapel has recently been built there, the invocation of which is unknown.
